_header: Lordings listen and hold you still
Subjects: Neville’s Cross, battle of; historical poems
_description: Durham Field, a ballad on the Battle of Neville’s Cross — sixty-five quatrains

BLAdd27879.First Lines:
Lordinges listen & hold you stilhearken to me a
                    litle…
